choices: WWI (Biplanes and triplanes. I.E. Fokker, Spad)
WWII (Monoplanes. I.E. P51, Focke wulf 190, Hellcat, Zero)
Vietnam (Supersonic jets. I.E. F4 Phantom, F8 Crusader, MiG 17, MiG 21)
WWIII (Generation 5 Planes. I.E. F22 Raptor, F35 Lightning, Su47)
1.content: First things first. Which war will this take place?
1.title: When

choices: Triple Alliance. Bad guys. Plane Fokker Dvii/D7
Triple Entente. Good guys. Plane Spad Xiii/ Spad 13
11.title: Which side

choices: U.S. Pacific. Good. Planes Wildcat and Hellcat
U.S. Europe. Good. Planes P51 Mustang and P47 Thunderbolt
Germany. Bad. Planes Fw 190, Bf 109, and near end of war Me262
RAF/Britain. Good. Planes Spitfire and Hurricane
12.content: There were 4 sides but the U.S. fought in Europe and Pacific theaters.
12.title: Who

121.content:
At the start of the Pacific War the Japanese had the best fighter. The lethal Zero. The best American plane at the time was the F4F Wildcat. It was tough, had good armament, and could out-dive the Zero. However the guns didn't always work, it was underpowered, wasn't very maneuverable, didn't have good range, and couldn't climb very well. The Zero was fast, maneuverable, had great range, could climb well, and could dive fast, but not as fast as the Wildcat. It still had one weakness. It ruggedness. The Zero lacked self sealing rubber fuel tanks, had no armor plate for the pilot and if you hit the spot where the left wing met the cockpit the Zero would instantly catch fire.

Tails knew he was up against a good plane. He was confident in his abilities but was respectful of the Zero. As he flew his first mission he and his squad of five encounter 6 Zeroes. He knows what to do. "Squad keep them on the straight path if you turn with them you're dead." The two sides merge and bank into each other. Tails reverses his turn when a Zero flies perpendicular to him. He gets on his tail and fires a short burst to kill the Zero. Another Zero is on his tail. He skids the plane to force the Zero to overshoot. He kills it with another short burst. Tails sees another two Zeroes diving on him. He calls for his squad to dive out of the fight. However no one else does. Tails is alone when he sees something off his left wing.

His wingman Sonic stayed with him throuh the fight. Tails checks their six o'clock and sees…
121.title: Rugged but sluggish

1211.content:
Tails and Sonic were retreating at full throttle. The Zero, in times of desperation turned into a kamikaze or suicide aircraft, was following Tails. Tails wasn't happy about this and knew the danger he was in. Even if they both ran out of ammo, the Zero would ram him killing them both (maybe Sonic too if more were present).
He reacted quickly and banked a hard left. The Zero easily did the same and fortunately it wasn't in range to fire any rounds. Tails glanced back to see Sonic roll in behind the Zero. Tails straightened out, if the Zero followed Sonic would have a clean shot. The Zero gave chase and Sonic peppered him down. The Zero pulled skyward, Sonic went by the Zero when it dove on him to bring Sonic down with him. Sonic saw the danger and rolled right but the Zero just clipped his wing, but the ruggedness of Wildcat saved him. Tails yelled, "YOU OK?!" Sonic called him, "Yeah I'm fine but there are not only more but a fleet of Junkers getting ready to do a bombing run on the town." Junkers were borrowed from Germany.

What happens next?
1211.title: New problems

12112.content: "Everyone airborne now. SCRAMBLE SCRAMBLE SCRAMBLE!!! Sonic we have to hold them off." "Where's the escort?" "We killed them already." The two engage the enemy Tails kills two bombers until he's down to two machine guns left, but they only have 100 rounds each. Sonic gets three when his guns run completely dry. "Tails I'm out I gotta head back. Be back soon." Tails must use his remaining ammo sparingly. So he gets on a Junkers' tail when the rear gunner starts shooting. Tails takes hits to his wings, his engine, his canopy, his prop, and one bullet hits him in his arm. He fires the last of his ammo into the bomber to bring his kill total to 5. He's an ace in a day, but his fifth kill may be his last. The remaining fighters gang up on Tails and he is already wounded. Tails tries to open the canopy but it's jammed. He needs help soon or the Wildcat will be his coffin.
12112.title: Pain

121122.content:
Tails throws the stick back with his good arm and causes the Wildcat to stall and enter a spin. Tails plummets for what seems like and eternity unilt the enemy fighters buy it. As Tails goes below 100 feet he has his Wildcat recover above the waves. Tails goes to land but his gear is jammed so he lands on his belly, but the tough Wildcat survives. The engineers break open the canopy and take Tails to the hospital. They need to treat the wound before it becomes infected. If it does Tails may be sent home.

The rest of the squad kills most of the bombers and the rest fled. Sonic brought his kill total to eight earning him ace status.

After some time…
121122.title: Spins

1211221.content:
It took over a year for Tails' arm to fully heal, during that time Sonic brought his kill total to 14. Almost triple ace. When Tails was finally cleared, the new F6F Hellcat entered and prepared to leave its fearsome mark. Tails brought the Hellcat to the runway with the others. The green light was given and they took off. The new Hellcat had about a 260-280 mile greater range than the Wildcat, giving about an extra hour of flight time, but was no less rugged.

Compared to the Zero the Hellcat had almost every advantage. It could out-dive, out-run, hit harder, and take more punishment than the Zero. It could climb with the Zero. Leaving the Zero with a very small range and turning advantage.

Tails and the others took off and flew patrol until someone call on the radio, "BANDITS, HUNDEREDS OF EM 9 O'CLOCK!!!!!" Tails looked to his left and saw there was hundreds of em. (Meaning there was lots of them not literally hundreds) Tails reacts with cool calmness. "Time to take the Hellcat for a test run." Sonic being flight lead orders a split. The thirty Hellcats were warned of a possible enemy attack from radar so more planes than normal were sent. The score was thirty Hellcat against at least sixty Zeroes. Despite the 2:1 odds Tails and Sonic lead the squad into the fray.

When the planes crossed it turned into a mix up of aircraft everywhere. Tails was to keep Sonic's tails clear at all times unless the leader says otherwise. Sonic however knows Tails has been itching for action for some time now. "Go have some fun Tails." "Thanks." Tails breaks off and latches onto a Zero knocking it out with his .50 cals. Tails sees a Zero diving on him from 10 O'clock and banks left. The Zero shoots past and Tails reverses and dispatches another Zero. Tails then sees a Zero below him going in the opposite direction. Tails does a split-S and gives chase. (In a split-S the pilot puts the plane on it's back and pulls on the stick until the plane levels off on it's belly) Tails gives a quick burst sealing his third kill. Tails then sees a Hellcat with a Zero in hot pursuit. Tails moves in behind the Zero and gets his fourth kill for the day.

There were so many planes that everywhere you pointed it seemed like there was a Japanese plane and they were so easy to kill Tails still had plenty of ammo. Then Tails is on the tail of another Zero and as he killed it his plane rocked under the force of 20mm shells. Tails decided enough was enough and he dove away from the fight. Suddenly a line of three Zeroes fleeing from the fight appear in front of Tails. Tails dives from 9 O'clock and shereds the three Zeroes with his remaining ammo.

Tails returns to base with 8 kills to his credit. For this feat is awarded the Flying Cross. Of the 60 Zeroes reported, half were killed. Three Hellcats were lost but the mission was still a great success. Tails is also moved back to flight lead. Tails' next mission is…
1211221.title: Back with a vengeance

12112212.content:
Tails had to get his Hellcat fixed because it had a fuel leak. However the Mobian airfoce needed him to lead against a bomber attack run. Tails was having a rather "boring" flight day as he was gliding in a Hellcat that was different than the one he customized. However this didn't last too long. He saw a fleet of "Betty" bombers heading their way but this wasn't a ordinary fleet. He recognized the "Betties" but he didn't recognize what they were carrying. He saw a new weapon that looked like a large rocket but not for long because the "Betties" turned away. This worried him because he didn't know what the JM's were doing.
Sonic was in a different situation. He moved to a temporary position as a Marine (no one knows why or how). However he saw some "Betties" and Zeroes coming towards the ship. He reacted fast and ordered them to prepare for battle. The "Betties" came to them as predicted.
Sonic was in trouble as he saw the Zeros fire at the Abele (ship they were on) they of course fired back and knocked out at least five of them but then he saw the "special" planes come. These came and fired the weapon, which seemed like a rocket with wings and a tail. In reality it was a piloted bomb
Tails flew over and didn't believe his eyes. He saw a Yokosuka MXY7 Ohka or Baka (which means idiot in Japenese) as the Americans dubbed it come at the ship.

What happens next?
12112212.title: Baka bomb

123.content:
Tails is ready for his second mission as a fighter pilot. His first was a disaster…

Flashback

Tails straps himself in the P47 and takes off. His mission is to destroy enemy fighters. Tails was supremely confident in his abilities as a fighter pilot and had been waiting for this day. Tails calls bingo fuel after a long uneventful flight when… BANG. Tails' plane dives by itself. Tails rolls the plane over to bail when it climbs. Tails hears his squadron mates say they destroyed a Fw190 that attacked Tails. Tails rolls the plane on its belly when it dives again. So he then rolls it on its back so it'll climb. "Damage assessment." "Uh I may need my vision checked but I think you lost your tail." (Without the tail the air will push the plane down if it's right-side-up and push it up if it's upside down.) Tails tries to bail but the canopy is stuck. He rolls over 500 times on the way back. All the while he's on fire. He times it right and lands the plane where the canopy is broken and Tails climbs out. Because his plane was on fire for so long he became known as Firefox.

After Tails is in the air he sees a 109 on his tail. What will he do…
123.title: WWII angels

1231.content: Tails turns the P47 skyward and climbs for his life. Rookie mistake, one that will cost him. The P47 is heavy and falls away first. Easy prey. Tails is hit by a 30mm bullet and is killed. He panicked and forgot his training, and for he paid with his life.
1231.title: Choice for the fools

1232.content: Tails remembers that the 109's controls freeze up at speeds above 400mph. Also the P47 is incredibly heavy and can out dive any aircraft of the war. (except the Me262) Tails dives and accelerates past 550 mph. The 109 dives after him but can't keep up and puts too many Gforces on the aircraft and rips the wings off. Tails is credited with the kill and lands with only 1/2 gallon of fuel left. Tails is on the board. Soon…
1232.title: Running for my life

choices: His base where there is a welcoming committe
12321.content:
Tails and his squadron were attacking a group of 109s returning from a patrol. So far most of the enemy squad was dead, but a few were holding their own. Tails' wingman speaks up as the enemy leader flys in front of him. "There's pretty boy, I'm going after him." "Careful buddy. He's good." Tails opts to follow as his wingman is unable to land hits. The 109 leader then did a move that stopped his aircraft, lifted the nose, and made it do a 360 degree turn. "Whoa sh**. How'd he do that?" He regained speed right behind Tails' wingman. "Get him off me get him off me." "Break right." He does and the 109 follows, right in front of Tails, who unleashes a torrent of hot lead. The leader's fuel tank and wings are shredded. He bails out. Tails looks at his control panel and draws a fifth cross on it. "That makes five. I'm an ace now." Someone in the squad exhaults. "Did Tails just say he became an ass, or an ace? I don't know if I heard him right?" They all laugh.

After the fight ends Tails and the others fly off. "Tails look at that!" Tails looks down to see...
12321.title: Ace

choices: Tails sees another foe approach him
123211.content:
Continue
Tails and the destroyer.
Tails didn't quite recognize the German destroyer. It looked like a Z-12 Erich, but that didn't matter to him. What did was that he wasn't alone and not in the good way either. The large ship saw its target, Tails.

What happens next?
123211.title: A German Destroyer

1232112.content: Tails looked up to see a Focke-Wulf 190 flying right towards him. "Great. Well I ain't making a head on pass with that thing." Due to the massive ammount of armament, the Focke-Wulf was dangerous to make a head on pass with. Even in the rugged Thunderbolt. Tails, remembering his Jug was fully armed with rockets, plans to get the plane and the ship. He fired 8 timed (Exploding after a certain period of time) 15 inch rockets at the 190. One of them gets close and blows the 190 out of existence. Tails then dives on the Destroyer. He makes a screaming dive and drops his 2 500 pound bombs. After they hit and cripple the ship by knocking out the generator, therby paralyzing the guns, he raked it with his 50 cals. He hits the main powder magazine and blows the ship in 2. Tails returns home in one piece.
1232112.title: Bombs away

choices: He sees something he didn't recognize
12322.content:
Tails got a new plane. This one was better than the P47 and was the well known P51 Mustang. He is assigned to a new mission and he drives off into action.

What happens next?
12322.title: After rest

123221.content: Tails continues with his squad. He flies near Berlin and sees something. He exaults, "Hold on… are those … JETS?!" His wingman agrees, "Looks like it and they're comin right for us." The fight begins. Tails pulls up behind one but it easily gets out of range. "THEY'RE TOO DAMN FAST!!!! We need more speed." The Mustang could go higher than the 262. Altitude that could be converted to speed. Tails climbs as high as he can go. A jet pursues but stalls and falls away. Tails noses over and fires. Shredding the jet with his 50 cals. He flies back into the furball at over 550mph. He pulls up behind another jet but this time he matches its speed and downs it easily. Tails is highly skilled but the leader pulls up behind Tails. Tails has two options…
123221.title: JETS

choices: Tails manages to get them down
1232212.content:
Tails throws his Mustang skyward but to his horror the enemy anticipated the move perfectly. Three 30mm bullets punish the Mustang. The first hits his right wing, the second hit his left wing, rendering his guns useless except for single shots, the third hit his canopy. The cockpit shatters and cuts Tails' arms, left leg, and forehead. Tails is wounded but not quite broken. He finds his guns can still fire. Tails reverses his climb, surprising the jet which tries to match it but can't. Tails then turns and as the less maneuverable jet dives he gets an angle. Tails plus the trigger repeatedly. Tails gets lucky as the bullets hit one of the jet's engines, cutting its' speed in half. Tails gets behind him and fires again, this time into the canopy. The pilot is killed and Tails retreats.

Tails' wingman, Sonic stays with him. "Tails. Tails are you ok?" "Uh Sonic I don't know there's a lot of blood." "Tails you must stay awake. Just keep talking to me." "Ok… ok. What are you going to do when this war is over?" Sonic thinks for a second. "I think I'll head back to the states and settle down. Maybe find someone to spend my life with. What about you?" "If I survive till it's over…" Sonic interrupts. "NO! NO IFS ONLY WHENS!" "Ok… when it's over I might stay for a bit and help people and countries recover from the war."

For the next few hours Sonic keeps Tails awake until the runway is in sight. "Ok Tails, we're here. Lower your flaps." Tails tries but due to the damage can't. "They're jammed I can't lower them." "Tails listen, try to manually crank them down."
1232212.title: Anticipated move

12322121.content:
Tails grabs the crank and yanks. After each crank the flaps decend. "Ok Sonic. They're down." "Good. Now lower your gear and land that bird." Tails lowers his gear and puts the plane down. As Tails stops the plane he is pulled out by medics. From the time he was hit to now Tails lost 2 liters of blood. (I'm going off of how much blood humans have so just go with it) As Tails is put in a stretcher Sonic walks up to Tails. "You ok?" "I think so." Sonic is surprised. "You've lost 1/3 of the blood in your body and you're still talking to me."

The doctors managed to save Tails' life, but he lost his left leg. However he was still at the ceremony to receive his Medal of Honor. And after he went home he received a prosthetic leg and managed to walk again. He lived to get married and had two kids. Then he died at 80 in his sleep.
12322121.title: Amputation

12322122.content:
"Sonic I can't. It won't budge" "Bail out if you can." "Sonic I'm dizzy and I don't think I'll find the cord in time." "Ok lower your gear."

The gear comes down. Tails approaches the runway. "Sonic I'm comin in too fast. Help me… I don't wanna die." Tails puts the plane down and is knocked out when his head hits the controls. "Tails use the brakes… Tails brakes now… Tails?…" Tails is headed for an incline at the end of the runway. If the plane falls off the extra force when it hits the ground again may cause it to explode. "TAILS!"

The plane flies off the edge and explodes when it hits the ground. "Tails." Sonic puts his plane down and runs to get to Tails' burning plane. He finds Tails' body and lifts him to the emergency unit. "Doctor help. Please save him." The doctor checks Tails' pulse. "I'm sorry… it's too late." "NO YOU HAVEN'T EVEN TRIED!" "He's already dead. Even if I tried it would do no good." Sonic is silent for a few moments then just walks out.

Sonic is too sad to even speak to anyone for a week. When he is ready he goes to Tails' funeral. It is announced that for defending his squad while fatally wounded Tails posthumously recieves the Medal of Honor. Which Sonic keeps to remember him.

Sonic retires to live in seclusion in the deep reaches of what will be Alaska. On the rare occasions when he speaks to people he still refuses to even talk about Tails. Sonic would have gladly given back all his kills to see Tails again but it didn't work out that way.

Tails died protecting what is right. He wouldn't have liked it any other way. One of Tails' sentences echos in Sonic's mind. "Shed no tears for me. My glory lives on forever."
12322122.title: Loss of a friend

choices: This was were he met Sonic (in this story)
1233.content:
Tails was a brave fox even before he was old enough to become a general. This meant that he was willing to fight any plane that got in his way. His P47 was on fire which was bad news, he didn't care. All he wanted to do was complete his mission at all costs even if he was to die on that day. He turned it and came face to face with his opponent.
The pilot in the M109 wasn't going to hold back for he had to complete a mission of his own, that meant destroying anything that got in his way. He steered into Tails' sights. Big mistake, Tails was a pretty good shooter even thought he was fairly young at the time (still is). Tails fired without hesitation and steered out of the way to avoid ramming his opponent.
When he steered away he saw his opponent eject himself out of the plane and the plane plummet down to earth. He would have cheered for his success but he now need to focus on saving himself. He grabbed a parachute and jumped out of the plane. Fortunately he was high enough to have enough time to land back on earth. He managed to do this even though he was burned severely.

What happens next?
1233.title: Tails and the Messerschmitt 109

12333.content:
Tails touches down wounded but still with a lot of fight left. Suddenly he is hit from behind. The enemy pilot hit Tails with his helmet still intent on killing him. Tails takes his helmet off quickly and turns to meet the German. Both pilots are hit but Tails, younger and more agile begins to take the advantage. Tails then grabs his .45 pistols and shoots the German with both. The German is killed but fractured Tails' skull. Tails returns to base and is in the hospital for 18 months before he's cleared for combat. By now the Americans have the best fighter on the runway.

The P51 Mustang.
12333.title: Tails vs the German Pilot

choices: Tails gets close to being an ace
124.content:
The year is 1941, Germany has just declared war on the U.S. and Miles "Tails" Prower has joined to fight the Americans. At the start of this period there were two main planes that fought. The P47 and the Me 109. Tails, in his flight suit, jumps in his Messerschmitt 109. He is to establish air superiority against the Allies. He flies with his trusted wingman and lifelong friend Sonic. Tails is a Captain and Sonic a Lieutenant. The two lift off and as they go through 1/4 of their fuel 4 P47Thunderbolts are spotted. Tails calls them out using the German code. "Achtung. Indianer." Meaning, 'Attention. Americans.' Sonic responds. "Jawhol. Ahead." Meaning 'Yes Sir. Ahead.'

The six planes engage and at this stage in the war the Germans have better planes. Tails and Sonic both get a kill while the other two run away. For the time being it will be easy. After some time…
124.title: Nazi Tails

choices: There's a Mustang on his tail
1242.content:
Tails has scored 10 kills making him a double ace. However on this mission he will make history or die.

Tails is now squadron leader and takes his formation of 10 109s in the sky. Their mission: Protect the bomber killing 190s from American fighters. Tails calls out. "B17s. No less than 100. Squad let's kill those fighters." 10 fighters escort the bombers. Sonic exhausts, "Tails we may get to take a crack at the bombers when we kill the fighters." Someone else in the squad alerts Tails, "Uh Colonel." "Yeah." "Those aren't Thunderbolts. They're to small." "Ok everyone. We have a new enemy. Try to get a close look but remember the mission."

The two squads merge and pass. Then begin a dogfight. One of Tails' men is in trouble. "TAILS THESE THINGS TURN TOO WELL AND ARE TOO FAST! I CAN'T GET AWAY! AHH IM GETTING TORN UP! I HAVE TO BAIL AHHHHHHH!" The pilot is killed and so are three others. Unfazed Tails slows his plane down and causes one to overshoot. Tails moves to kill him but remembers to check his six. He sees…
1242.title: Mustang

12421.content:
Tails sees he's clear so he pulls the trigger. His big 30mm canon cuts the Mustang in half. Tails realizes he can't keep fighting or he'll die. He and his remain 4 fighters bug out. The mission was a failure and the B17s hit their target.

Through the next two years Tails only scores three kills and is shot down 10 times. He knows the Mustang is too good of a fighter for the 109 and 190. Luckily there's a new plane on its way that will change the world.
12421.title: Germany's desperation

124211.content:
Tails and three others, including his friend Sonic, are selected to fly the new jet fighters on their first combat mission. Their mission is to kill approaching reconnaissance and fighter planes. Only the Germans have seen the jet so the element of surprise is key.

The squad begins patrol and sees five enemy P51s approaching. "Show no mercy. SPLIT!" They split formation and attack their own targets. Tails goes after the leader. They make a head on pass and Tails' 4 30mm canons make quick work of the American. Tails then targets the enemy lead's wingman. He try to climb away but the jet easily keeps pace. Tails fires. The Mustang literally blows up.

Tails' squadron mates have each killed the fighter they targeted. Tails sees a glimmer of hope for the situation.
124211.title: Wonder weapon

125.content:
Tails takes off in his Hurricane to find the nearest Luftwaffe base and relay coordinates to bombers. The British are taking a beating from the Germans and need to counter. Tails relays the coordinates when 6 109s attack him. "Tails to base come in." "Go ahead." "I'm over an enemy base and I've got 109s all over me." "Copy what are you flying." "AN AIRPLANE YOU IDIOT!!!! Send the damn Calvary now. Tell them to haul ass." "Understood ETA 5 minutes." "I don't think I'll last that long."

Tails mixes it up with the 109s, shoots at any planes that come too close. After 10 minutes Tails is desperate with six of 8 empty guns and only 200 rounds left. "WHERE THE HELL ARE THEY?"
125.title: Swarmed

choices: Tails lands but no-one rushes to congratulate him. Why?
Tails forgets to put his gear down on landing and is court-martialled
Tails lands, rejoices and meets a pretty young Air Traffic Controller who....
1252.content:
"We're inbound now." "Bout damn time." 6 other Hurricanes arrive to back up the young fox. The 109s stay in a close formation. 'Must be their first fight. Maybe their last too.'

Tails knows the 109 can outrun and outgun his poor old Hurry but in this instance, the enemy planes, all unknowing, fly right across the Hurricane's nose.

'Damn I almost forgot that with the camera I only have 4 of my .30 cals. Eh what the Hell.' Tails squeezes the trigger. .30 calibers shred 2 of the 109s.

"Two down seven to go.".

He pulled the plane round in a five-g turn, he turned to the right. They were always told to turn to the right with the 109 because they had a bad stall characteristic in a right turn. The 109s give chase but losen their turn to avoid a stall. After three rotations Tails gets a firing angle. His bullets hit the thin wing of the 109 and slice them clean off. Suddenly. "DUN DUN DUN DUN. Tails looks behind him and sees a 109 firing deadly 20mm shells at him. He decides to do a bold move.

"Here goes nothing!". Tails shouted and threw his nose skyward. Then slammed his rudder. In effect he stalled his plane and made it dive. His speed goes to 0 and the 109 flies past. His plane recovers and he sure didn't go back to that fight.
1252.title: Inbound now

12521.content: Tails lands expecting a congratulations for his reconnaissance success, but no one is there. He looks over and sees the Hurricanes and Spitfires but the runway is empty besides that. "Hey what's wrong we got a jump on them. We should be happy." The tower answers. "Listen up." He hears in a harsh tone. "The people who went up to cover your ass were in our only operable planes. The others still can't fly yet and the bombers that got through destroyed half of our base. Look around you bastard." Tails swivels his head and sees the bombed out field. The base looks like the surface of the moon. "Wait you can't possibly believe it was my fault? I had no choice." "If you had just taken your death like a real soldier then the 100 crew here wouldnt have died. You called in to save one man and open a way for enemy bombers to destroy our base. That doesn't balance. Next time that happens your days of flight are over and people will shun you for life." Tails rolls his eyes. This man always got mad at people of higher rank because he was slow to be promoted. Even when Tails did something right it was still his fault. Tails' temper is running high and is threatening to explode. Eventually…
12521.title: What's happening?

125211.content:
Tails' temper finally boiled over. This man treated everyone of a higher rank like trash, come to think of it, he treated the lower ranks the same.

Tails suddenly yells and tackles the man.

Tails: YOU SON OF A BITCH! *He continues to yell while throwing punches to his face.* DO OUR LIVES MEAN NOTHING?! *Whack* RESPECT THE UNIFORM CORPORAL! *Whack* I COULD GET YOUR ASS COURT-MARTIALED FOR TREATING ME THAT WAY! *Whack* I'VE *Whack* HAD *Whack* ENOUGH! *Whack Whack Whack*

Tails gets off of the now unconscious man. He looks at the crowd that had gathered. He began to cry because of his sudden outburst. He pushes through.

Tails: Excuse me.


Tails goes into his tent. It was only occupied by him. But there were 2 beds. The other was unmade. A sign that someone had used it. Tails picked up the picture on his dresser. It was of him and Sonic, both in uniform. Tails was a flier and Sonic was with the infantry stationed a mile from Tails' base. But the distance didn't matter to him of course. He was able to move between them quickly so he was allowed to stay with Tails. The picture had Tails in one of Sonic's head locks while receiving a noogie. Sonic had been killed in one of the bombing raids on the base. What made Tails so mad is that the man he just slugged didn't even care, and seemed almost happy, Sonic was dead. Like it was just one man of a higher rank that was killed and made room for his promotion that he said he would get.

?: Tails.

Tails looked up to see the commander of the base.

Tails: *Stands at attention and salutes.* Sir.

Commander: *Returns then ends his salutes. Tails then puts his hand down.* I want to talk to you about what happened. You see I...
125211.title: A deep anger from deeper subjects

1252112.content:
Continue
Tails and the commander
Commander: I hate him too.
Tails: (couldn't think of what to say) Uh...
Commander: He's a nuisance to everyone. I am surprised the general didn't fire him but anyway I must be leaving. You too, you will be having a busy day tomorrow.
Tails: Uh, yes sir.

What happens next?
1252112.title: Hate him too

choices: Suddenly, 20 mm shells smash Tails' plane
12521121.content:
Tails was idling on the runway in a new Spitfire, his mission was not yet clear. He was told to wait for the signal. 'What signal' Tails thought.

*The air raid siren goes off.*

Tails: Oh that signal.

*Tails and three others lift off. They use their radar, in WWII their eyes are their radars, to scan the sky. Tails spots 10 objects coming FAST!*

If he goes for the kill, he may black out, but he doesn't want to let the pilot get away.

info.brief_description: Tails is good with planes, but what will happen when he sees air combat?
info.description:
In this story we follow Miles "Tails" Prower through a war. He is a pilot, but for which side, in which war, and what planes? That's where you come in. Here are the ground rules.

1. Pilots did die in these wars so it is possible for Tails to be killed.
2. You CAN'T make up your own planes. They must have been built already or will be built soon.
3. This is STRICTLY air combat. If you stray from that your chapter will be removed. There is one exception. If you go back to when two people met and how they came to fly with each other. Ex. Tails meets Sonic and Sonic is Tails' wingman.
4. The information put in these chapters must be true.
5. When the war ends the story is over.

I am open to criticism as long as you don't use vulgar words (I.E. swears) and you include ways I can improve.

Thank you for your time.
